titleStmt.title: To you that are called by the name of Baptists, or the baptized people that do what you do by imitation from John Baptist, Christ and the Apostles, who had not the form without the power to reform; but you have only the form, but wants the power that doth reform. Also several other things given forth from the spirit of the Lord, necessary for all people to take into consideration as they love their souls.
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.
Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.
Fox, Goerge, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Farnworth; "Several other things given forth from the spirit of the Lord" signed: J.N. and G.F. (i.e. James Naylor and George Fox).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
